Welcome to pycloud’s documentation!¶

This is a cloud sync application using python that can watch a directory on Linux and Android Clients and sync them with a server. File creations and deletions are reflected to each client.

Contents:

  • Project Summary
    • Summary
    • Scope
  • Project Goals
    • GOAL-1: Develop an application script to monitor updates to selected folders.
    • GOAL-2: Develop an FTP/push notification subsystem to send updates.
    • GOAL-3: Sync to a Network Attached Storage and extend application to mobile devices
